text: If the game package only includes multiple console games: Based on the amount of downloads of the console games, the sharing percentage among all CSPs in the package shall be calculated as follows: Total income of game package * (1 - bad debt rate) * (1 - sharing percentage for fee collection channel) *50% * (number of downloads of such CSP's online game/aggregate number of downloads of all console games contained in the game package)

text: Within twenty (20) days after the end of each Calendar Quarter , GSK shall pay Theravance royalty payments based on Net Sales in such Calendar Quarter during the Term as follows: On total Annual Worldwide Net Sales up to and including U.S. $3 Billion: 15 % On total Annual Worldwide Net Sales greater than U.S. $3 Billion: 5 % it being understood that Net Sales of a single agent Collaboration Product will be combined with Net Sales of a LABA/ICS Combination Product for purposes of the foregoing royalty calculation.
